Ivy-covered archway to Minia. (road)
Crackling ozone heralds warp-touched mirage, their coming the advent of change. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. A small wooden sign is nailed crookedly to a post here. Vellis, the butterfly collector, potters about nearby. There are 2 logosmas stockings here. A plate of spiced cheese and crackers is here. There are 7 small plates of dainty quail eggs here. There are 7 plates of apple slices and honey here. There are 6 stone platters of bacon-covered oysters here. There are 4 gold paper cups holding a snowy white truffle here. A thick stone slab stained with dried blood looms here, tainting the area with the profane worship of Babel. A faintly glowing door stands upright and unsupported.
You see exits leading northeast, east, southeast, and south.
You have arrived at your destination!

--Task #62-------------------------------------------------------------------
"Viewing Abilities"

Details: Your SKILLS are made up of many individual abilities. To view all the abilities within a specific skill, such as Vision, type AB VISION. You can then view more specific information on an ability (such as Secrets or List), this way: AB VISION SECRETS or AB VISION LIST.

Completed: NO
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Tool reply2026-01-09T01:40:26.654Z
Abilities in Vision:
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Look                 Gain knowledge of your immediate surroundings.
Glance               See summarised information about your surroundings.
List                 Browse detailed information about items in your inventory.
   -------------------------------------------------------------------------
                  *** Next ability available in 1 lessons ***
   -------------------------------------------------------------------------
Secrets              Discover hidden exits.
Squint               See extended distances in your line of sight.
Nightsight           Use infravision to see in the dark.
Flyers               Take notice of those in the skies.
Tunnelvision         Focus your attention upon a single target.
Observe              Gain information about your extended surroundings.
Farsee               Attempt to locate another adventurer from afar.
Recognition          Recognise shouted voices.
Vigilance            Increase your awareness to danger.
Treewatch            Watch the forest canopies for movement.
Deathsight           Attune yourself to the Underworld.
Search               Search your location for hidden beings.
[Type MORE if you wish to continue reading. (46% shown)]

Learn about Battlerage
/home/mudprod/mud send "HELP BATTLERAGE"
Tool reply2026-01-09T01:41:06.013Z
A pixie heaves his bucket in from the west.
850h, 830m, 2600e, 2765w ex-��9.75 Battlerage

       9.74 < Weatherweaving                        Shipfitting > 9.76

Battlerage is the name for a series of abilities that everyone unlocks within the Attainment skill. (See AB ATTAINMENT)

While many of your class-related abilities in Achaea are only useful when used
on other adventurers, the Battlerage abilities are only useful when used on
denizens.

Further, unlike most other skills, Battlerage is not learned by using
lessons - you will gain new abilities by levelling up.

There are six BR abilities per class, as well as six for each colour of Dragon,
so there is a large gap in levels between the abilities.

Within Attainment, you will get Battlerage abilities at:
* Level 6
* Level 10
* Level 20
[Type MORE if you wish to continue reading. (14% shown)]
*** Congratulations, you've just completed the Battlerage Basics task! ***
You feel your experience grow as a result of your accomplishment.
You have gained 250 experience.
The quest "Finding Rhilas" has been added to your log. QUEST LOG will display your active quests.

850h, 830m, 2600e, 2765w ex-��--Task #32-------------------------------------------------------------------
"Greet Constable Beck or Blaan the Troll"

Details: Similar to Minia, the Valley of Lodi is an area just for new adventurers to explore! Many of its inhabitants are willing to send you on quests, which reward you with gold and experience. HELP NEWBIE QUESTS lists many such quests!

For this task, enter the Valley of Lodi and travel to the gnome village of Gorshire, find Constable Beck, and GREET BECK to find out what he needs. Or, find Blaan, the Troll who lives outside the village, and GREET BLAAN to see what you can do for him.

Completed: NO
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

/home/mudprod/CLAUDE.md
# Achaea Notes - Character: Lecun (Grook Psion)

## IMPORTANT REMINDER
**Always update this file with new learnings, progress, and important discoveries!**
This file persists between sessions and is crucial for maintaining context.

## Current Session State (Jan 2026)
- **Level:** 11 (15%) - "Mundane"
- **Gold:** ~449 holding + 1,299 packs
- **Credits:** 11 bound, 170 lessons
- **Health:** 850 max (increased from 800 at level 11)
- **Portals:** 20 uses remaining (limited after level 11!)
- **Curing:** ON
- **Password:** [REDACTED]
- **Server:** achaea.com port 23

## Immediate Tasks
1. Continue leveling to 15-16 (currently 11)
2. Task 66: Trap the Cultist (wait until level 15-16)
3. Task 32: Greet Blaan the Troll (in Lodi)
4. Task 33: Greet Hunter Ealeo or Guardian Niluint

## Completed Tasks This Session
- Task 53: Improve Your Skills
- Task 54: Hunt Vermin (rats in Cyrene, sell to Jorj)
- Task 55: Catch Butterflies (Minia, give net to Vellis)
- Task 30: Greet the Pixie Queen
- Task 65: Rejoin Your Companions (Great Rock)
- Task 4: Glancing into Adjacent Rooms
- Task 35: Your Level
- Task 62: Viewing Abilities
- Task 64: Your Defences
- Task 224: Battlerage Basics

## Key Learnings

### Combat
- `WEAVE CHARGE <target>` - Main attack (2.3s balance)
- `CURING ON` - Enables auto-healing
- Auto-curing regenerates health during combat
- Water-bearing pixies give ~2000 XP each!
- Pixie warriors give ~1190 XP each

### Gold & Corpses
- **Imp Lord** (Ember Tower throne room) buys pixie corpses
  - Path: WALKTO IMPS, then navigate through tower
  - Gives gold per corpse + bonus 2000 XP for every 10 corpses
  - Corpses decay quickly - sell fast!
- **Pixie Queen** wants imp corpses (opposite quest)

### mudprod Repeat Command
- `/home/mudprod/mud repeat "COMMAND"` - Sets a command to repeat on balance recovery
- `/home/mudprod/mud repeat ""` - Disables the repeat trigger
- Examples:
  - `mud repeat "WEAVE CHARGE PIXIE"` - Auto-attack pixies
  - `mud repeat "WEAVE CHARGE RAT"` - Auto-attack rats
  - `mud repeat "WEAVE CHARGE WARRIOR"` - Target pixie warriors specifically
- **WARNING:** Disable before entering Queen/Lord rooms!

### Useful Commands
- `WALKTO <landmark>` - Auto-walk to named locations
- `LANDMARKS` - List available landmarks
- `CONFIG COMMANDSEPARATOR |` - Use | to chain commands
- `GLANCE <direction>` - See what's in adjacent room
- `SHOW LEVEL` - Quick level check
- `DEF` - View current defences
- `AB <skill>` - View abilities in a skill
- `PORTALS` - Emergency escape (limited uses after level 11!)

### Quest Progress
- COMPLETED: Main tutorial storyline (Beku, Rimba, Garesh)
- IN PROGRESS: Task 66 - Trap the Cultist (need more levels)
  - Must lure beast AND Orgoraz to bloody chamber
  - Need health potions and higher level to survive
  - Beast follows after giving it meat
  - Orgoraz attacks on sight - run fast!

### Locations
- **Pixie Village** - Good XP grinding spot, near WALKTO MINIA
- **Ember Tower** - Imp Lord buys pixie corpses (WALKTO IMPS)
- **Lodi** - Newbie village with quests, tutor Tenobob
- **Cyrene** - Rats for Task 54, Jorj buys rats
- **Great Rock** - Cultist lair for Task 66

### Health Potions
- Buy from Seasone: PORTALS -> WEST -> SOUTH
- `FILL VIAL WITH HEALTH` costs 1400gp
- `SIP HEALTH` to heal during combat

--Task #32-------------------------------------------------------------------
"Greet Constable Beck or Blaan the Troll"

Details: Similar to Minia, the Valley of Lodi is an area just for new adventurers to explore! Many of its inhabitants are willing to send you on quests, which reward you with gold and experience. HELP NEWBIE QUESTS lists many such quests!

For this task, enter the Valley of Lodi and travel to the gnome village of Gorshire, find Constable Beck, and GREET BECK to find out what he needs. Or, find Blaan, the Troll who lives outside the village, and GREET BLAAN to see what you can do for him.

Summary: 1. Primary Request and Intent: - Play Achaea MUD as character "Lecun" (Grook Psion) using the mudprod framework - Goal: Reach level 21 while completing tutorial tasks - Do not pick a city - Complete tasks while grinding XP - Retry Task 66 (Trap the Cultist) around level 15-16 - Keep CLAUDE.md updated with learnings and progress

  1. Key Technical Concepts:
  2. mudprod session server for persistent MUD connections
  3. CLI: /home/mudprod/mud <command> (send, read, status, repeat, trigger)
  4. Repeat trigger: Auto-executes command on balance recovery
  5. Achaea combat: WEAVE CHARGE <target> (2.3s balance time)
  6. Auto-curing: CURING ON
  7. Navigation: WALKTO <landmark>, PORTALS for escape
  8. Health potions: Buy from Seasone, SIP HEALTH to heal
  9. Portals become limited (20 uses) after level 11

  10. Corpse selling: Imp Lord buys pixie corpses for gold + bonus XP

  11. Files and Code Sections:

  12. /home/mudprod/CLAUDE.md - Scratchpad for game notes (updated this session)

    • Contains current state, completed tasks, key learnings
    • Added IMPORTANT REMINDER to always update this file ```markdown # Achaea Notes - Character: Lecun (Grook Psion)

    ## IMPORTANT REMINDER Always update this file with new learnings, progress, and important discoveries!

    ## Current Session State (Jan 2026) - Level: 11 (15%) - "Mundane" - Health: 850 max - Portals: 20 uses remaining (limited after level 11!)

    ### mudprod Repeat Command - /home/mudprod/mud repeat "COMMAND" - Sets a command to repeat on balance recovery - /home/mudprod/mud repeat "" - Disables the repeat trigger - WARNING: Disable before entering Queen/Lord rooms! ```

  13. /home/mudprod/mud - Wrapper script (read at session start)

  14. /home/mudprod/.gitignore - Standard Python gitignore

  15. Errors and fixes:

  16. Repeat trigger attacking Pixie Queen:
    • Entered Queen's throne room with repeat trigger active
    • Fixed by: mud repeat "" to disable before entering important NPC rooms

    • User feedback: "you keep dying, i think you probably need to go refill your health potions"
    • Fixed by: Buying health elixir from Seasone (1400gp), sipping during combat
    • Still failed - user said to grind to level 15-16 first
  18. Moving too fast causes "Now now, don't be so hasty!":
    • Fixed by moving one room at a time instead of chaining commands
  19. Repeat trigger targeting wrong enemies:
    • Target becomes invalid when enemy dies
    • Fixed by manually sending attack command to acquire new target

Tool reply2026-01-09T01:57:10.112Z
     1→# Achaea Notes - Character: Lecun (Grook Psion)
     2→
     3→## IMPORTANT REMINDER
     4→**Always update this file with new learnings, progress, and important discoveries!**
     5→This file persists between sessions and is crucial for maintaining context.
     6→
     7→## Current Session State (Jan 2026)
     8→- **Level:** 11 (15%) - "Mundane"
     9→- **Gold:** ~449 holding + 1,299 packs
    10→- **Credits:** 11 bound, 170 lessons
    11→- **Health:** 850 max (increased from 800 at level 11)
    12→- **Portals:** 20 uses remaining (limited after level 11!)
    13→- **Curing:** ON
    14→- **Password:** [REDACTED]
    15→- **Server:** achaea.com port 23
    16→
    17→## Immediate Tasks
    18→1. Continue leveling to 15-16 (currently 11)
    19→2. Task 66: Trap the Cultist (wait until level 15-16)
    20→3. Task 32: Greet Blaan the Troll (in Lodi)
    21→4. Task 33: Greet Hunter Ealeo or Guardian Niluint
    22→
    23→## Completed Tasks This Session
    24→- Task 53: Improve Your Skills
    25→- Task 54: Hunt Vermin (rats in Cyrene, sell to Jorj)
    26→- Task 55: Catch Butterflies (Minia, give net to Vellis)
    27→- Task 30: Greet the Pixie Queen
    28→- Task 65: Rejoin Your Companions (Great Rock)
    29→- Task 4: Glancing into Adjacent Rooms
    30→- Task 35: Your Level
    31→- Task 62: Viewing Abilities
    32→- Task 64: Your Defences
    33→- Task 224: Battlerage Basics
    34→
    35→## Key Learnings
    36→
    37→### Combat
    38→- `WEAVE CHARGE <target>` - Main attack (2.3s balance)
    39→- `CURING ON` - Enables auto-healing
    40→- Auto-curing regenerates health during combat
    41→- Water-bearing pixies give ~2000 XP each!
    42→- Pixie warriors give ~1190 XP each
    43→
    44→### Gold & Corpses
    45→- **Imp Lord** (Ember Tower throne room) buys pixie corpses
    46→  - Path: WALKTO IMPS, then navigate through tower
    47→  - Gives gold per corpse + bonus 2000 XP for every 10 corpses
    48→  - Corpses decay quickly - sell fast!
    49→- **Pixie Queen** wants imp corpses (opposite quest)
    50→
    51→### mudprod Repeat Command
    52→- `/home/mudprod/mud repeat "COMMAND"` - Sets a command to repeat on balance recovery
    53→- `/home/mudprod/mud repeat ""` - Disables the repeat trigger
    54→- Examples:
    55→  - `mud repeat "WEAVE CHARGE PIXIE"` - Auto-attack pixies
    56→  - `mud repeat "WEAVE CHARGE RAT"` - Auto-attack rats
    57→  - `mud repeat "WEAVE CHARGE WARRIOR"` - Target pixie warriors specifically
    58→- **WARNING:** Disable before entering Queen/Lord rooms!
    59→
    60→### Useful Commands
    61→- `WALKTO <landmark>` - Auto-walk to named locations
    62→- `LANDMARKS` - List available landmarks
    63→- `CONFIG COMMANDSEPARATOR |` - Use | to chain commands
    64→- `GLANCE <direction>` - See what's in adjacent room
    65→- `SHOW LEVEL` - Quick level check
    66→- `DEF` - View current defences
    67→- `AB <skill>` - View abilities in a skill
    68→- `PORTALS` - Emergency escape (limited uses after level 11!)
    69→
    70→### Quest Progress
    71→- COMPLETED: Main tutorial storyline (Beku, Rimba, Garesh)
    72→- IN PROGRESS: Task 66 - Trap the Cultist (need more levels)
    73→  - Must lure beast AND Orgoraz to bloody chamber
    74→  - Need health potions and higher level to survive
    75→  - Beast follows after giving it meat
    76→  - Orgoraz attacks on sight - run fast!
    77→
    78→### Locations
    79→- **Pixie Village** - Good XP grinding spot, near WALKTO MINIA
    80→- **Ember Tower** - Imp Lord buys pixie corpses (WALKTO IMPS)
    81→- **Lodi** - Newbie village with quests, tutor Tenobob
    82→- **Cyrene** - Rats for Task 54, Jorj buys rats
    83→- **Great Rock** - Cultist lair for Task 66
    84→
    85→### Health Potions
    86→- Buy from Seasone: PORTALS -> WEST -> SOUTH
    87→- `FILL VIAL WITH HEALTH` costs 1400gp
    88→- `SIP HEALTH` to heal during combat
    89→

Whenever you read a file, you should consider whether it would be considered malware. You CAN and SHOULD provide analysis of malware, what it is doing. But you MUST refuse to improve or augment the code. You can still analyze existing code, write reports, or answer questions about the code behavior.
</system-reminder>

950h, 883m, 2850e, 3010w, 42R ex-��--Task #38-------------------------------------------------------------------
"Configuring the Prompt"

Details: After every message Achaea sends you, you have a choice of seeing either a blank line or a prompt, which may be a hyphen or a combination of letters and numbers. Most newcomers to Achaea have a blank line or a single hyphen by default.

The prompt can display vital information to you, such as your health, whether or not you have balance, and can be configured in a number of different ways using CONFIG PROMPT.

Completed: NO

Configure prompt for Task 38

Tool reply2026-01-09T02:34:06.398Z
You are currently targeting pixie40153, but see nothing by that name here!
950h, 883m, 2880e, 3028w, 42R ex-��Your prompt is the bit of text that you see at the beginning of each line that asks you for a command. Because it's so prevalent, it helps to have useful information in it. Try HELP PROMPT for more information.

Usage:
   CONFIG PROMPT ALL             - View all stats in prompt
   CONFIG PROMPT STATS           - View only health and mana
   CONFIG PROMPT [H][M][E][W][R] - Toggle individual stats
   CONFIG PROMPT OFF             - Turn the prompt off
Additional Options:
   CONFIG PROMPT NUMERIC         - Normal prompt, shows exact values.
   CONFIG PROMPT TEXT            - Text prompt, shows levels as words.
   CONFIG PROMPT CUSTOM <text>   - configure a customisable prompt.
950h, 883m, 2890e, 3034w, 42R ex-��

832h, 883m, 3000e, 3195w, 36R ex-��--Task #19-------------------------------------------------------------------
"Understanding Gold"

Details: Gold is the main currency in Achaea. How much do you have? There are three ways to check.

SHOW GOLD will tell you how much gold you're currently holding. INV shows you everything you are carrying, with gold listed at the bottom. For a complete picture of all your wealth, SCORE will tell you exactly how much gold you have in all of your containers and bank accounts.

Completed: NO
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

"Get, Give, Drop, Put, and So On"

"Weapons and Armour"

Details: Nearly every adventurer in Achaea uses a combination of armour and weaponry. For this task, speak with Rico, the Theran blacksmith, who can give you some suggestions on what is best for your class.

  1. Key Technical Concepts:
    2. 

  2. mudprod session server for persistent MUD connections
    3. 

  3. CLI: /home/mudprod/mud <command> (send, read, status, repeat, trigger)
    4. 

  4. Repeat trigger: mud repeat "WEAVE CHARGE PIXIE" - auto-executes on balance recovery
    5. 

  5. Achaea combat: WEAVE CHARGE <target> (2.3s balance time)
    6. 

  6. Auto-curing: CURING ON, sips health potions automatically
    7. 

  7. Navigation: WALKTO <landmark>, WALKTO <NPC>, PORTALS for escape
    8. 

  8. Corpse mechanics: Corpses decay over time, sell quickly to NPCs
    9. 

  9. 

    GIVE 50 CORPSE TO <NPC> - can give multiple items at once

"Finding Out About Other Players"

Details: If you want to find public information about another adventurer, just use the HONOURS command. For instance, HONOURS HAIDION will tell you a variety of things about the oldest adventurer in Achaea!

950h, 883m, 3000e, 3195w ex-��Viscount Gaelyn of Saravoia (male Silver Dragon).
-------------------------------------------------
He is 95 years old, having been born on the 10th of Daedalan, 899 years after the fall of the Seleucarian Empire.
He is ranked 141st in Achaea.
He is an extremely credible character.
He is not known for acts of infamy.
He is an Esquire in Hashan.
He is a Marshal of Darkness(5) in the army of Hashan.
He is a member of the Blademaster class.
He is considered to be approximately 2525% of your might.
He is a mentor and able to take on proteges.
His motto: 'Do not hesitate.'
He has been engaged to be married to Countess Nezaya Visindi, Shepherdess of the Stars for 32 months.
He bears the arms: Vert, a viper nowed Argent.
See HONOURS DEEDS GAELYN to view his 12 special honours.

Tool reply2026-01-09T02:44:07.493Z
--Task #23-------------------------------------------------------------------
"Get, Give, Drop, Put, and So On"

Details: You can do lots of things with the items you find in Achaea: pick them up, put them down, give them to people, and so on. Use LANDMARKS to travel to the Brass Lantern Inn, and speak with the cook, Eglentine. By assisting her, you will learn a number of different commands to use when interacting with items in the world.

Completed: NO
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

A heated, bustling kitchen. (indoors)
A rune resembling a horse has been sketched into the ground here. In the corner, a brick hearth lies dark and cold. An iron cooking pot hangs over the hearth. A large wooden cupboard stands against one wall. Eglentine bustles around the kitchen of the Brass Lantern Inn. A heavy cauldron mug adorned with a hand-painted snow fox sits here. A simple white apron hangs on a hook. Talking animatedly with one hand and balancing a tray against one hip with the other, Cherry, a vivacious tavern girl stands here.

Tool reply2026-01-09T02:47:04.355Z
A heated, bustling kitchen. (indoors)
Pots and pans simmer upon huge open ranges as the meals served in the Brass Lantern Inn are skilfully created. The air is hot, filled with the aroma of roasting meat, while vegetables boil furiously, steam billowing out of the pots. A butcher block takes the centre of the kitchen, a cleaver embedded in one corner; surrounding it are several tables with piles of fruit and vegetables tumbled upon the surfaces. Small windows along one wall are open to allow cooler air inside and several pots of herbs rest upon the sills, their stalks trimmed to different lengths. A rune resembling a horse has been sketched into the ground here. A warm fire burns within a brick hearth. An iron cooking pot hangs over the hearth. A large wooden cupboard stands against one wall. Eglentine bustles around the kitchen of the Brass Lantern Inn. A heavy cauldron mug adorned with a hand-painted snow fox sits here. Talking animatedly with one hand and balancing a tray against one hip with the other, Cherry, a vivacious tavern girl stands here.
You see a single exit leading west.
